trans-unit.source: The ManagementTask attribute indicates that the target method implements a WMI method.
trans-unit.target: ManagementTask 属性指示目标方法实现 WMI 方法。

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ WMI.NET 库都被视为在最终状态，不进一步开发、 增强功能，或更新将可供影响这些库的非安全相关问题。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.
By default, the WMI method name will be the name of the target method.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，WMI 方法名称将目标方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The parent class of this attribute, <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementMemberAttribute>, includes a Name parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此特性的父类<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementMemberAttribute>，包括名称参数。</xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementMemberAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can use that parameter to change the name of the method that is exposed through WMI without changing your internal method name.
trans-unit.target: 该参数可用于更改而无需更改您的内部方法名称通过 WMI 公开的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The method must be public and it may be static.
trans-unit.target: 该方法必须是公共的它可能是静态。

trans-unit.source: It can include any combination of [in], [out], [in/out], array or object reference parameters.
trans-unit.target: 它可以包括任意组合的 [in] [out]，[in/out]，数组或对象引用参数。

trans-unit.source: Array parameters cannot be multidimensional or jagged because of limitations imposed by WMI.
trans-unit.target: 由于 WMI 施加的限制，就不能是多维或交错进行数组参数。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the method can be: void, scalar, string, datetime or object.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的返回类型可以是︰ void 标量，字符串，datetime 或对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Management.ManagementTaskAttribute> class.
Gets or sets a value that defines the type of output that the method that is marked with the ManagementTask attribute will output.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，定义用 ManagementTask 特性标记的方法将输出的输出的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the returned type is <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>, then the output should be treated as a value of type <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回的类型<xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>，然后输出应被视为类型<xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>的值</xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> value that indicates the type of output that the method that is marked with the ManagementTask attribute will output.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>值，该值指示用 ManagementTask 特性标记的方法将输出的输出的类型。</xref:System.Type>
